website_summaries.verdict: When you don't want something cutesy, these simple, wraparound earmuffs get the job done.
pros: Low profile enough to fit under bike helmet
Fit anywhere from ages 5 to small adults
Fit from the back of the head
cons: Can be a little stiff at first – take a while to break in

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and low-profile
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair since my son lost his first pair (and then found it again, of course, as soon as I bought this one). Anyhow, it fits well and is low profile, so he can wear it under his bike helmet. They can be a bit stiff at first. It takes a bit to break them in and bend them the way that they fit the child's head. Wish they made different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Kelm

customer_reviews.title: We each have our own pair and absolutely love them but my 7 year old is always borrowing ...
customer_reviews.text: We each have our own pair and absolutely love them but my 7 year old is always borrowing them. So I was so excited when I found this Youth size! Now he has his own that fit better. Great to keep the ears warm!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: 180 Degrees of Comfort and Warmth
customer_reviews.text: I have a small adult frame and this fits me well. Love the color (red), love the fit, and my ears love the warmth. It twists and stretches with little clicking sounds as you fine tune the adjustable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Betin Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good for Horseback Riding
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son to use during his horseback riding lessons. I wanted something that would work with his riding helmet and these stay on well without having to go over his head. Together with gloves and a neoprene neck warmer, he's all set.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wentz

customer_reviews.title: warm ears
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was timely and ear warmers do keep you warm. They are small so they would fit a child or small adult.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J. Ross

customer_reviews.title: They are a great fit! He is able to put them on ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old son. They are a great fit! He is able to put them on and take them off without me and without the back snapping in two pieces. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: gift for Colorado
customer_reviews.text: My grandson lives in Denver and I wanted to protect his ears. These are great for children and adults, because the fit from the back of the bead.
customer_reviews.author: Veron B Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Great product by a little stiff and kept popping off
customer_reviews.text: Great product by a little stiff and kept popping off, took a bit to get them on but once we did they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for myself. I am an older woman with a small head and these fit perfectly. I actually bought the same brand at Kohl's and they were too big
customer_reviews.author: Puffer

customer_reviews.title: Slide right off...
customer_reviews.text: No matter how I adjust these, they won't stay on. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: auntyshoes

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these...they fit under a ponytail and dont mess up her hair...I only wish the youth ones came in more colors..Great product!
customer_reviews.author: salty

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old Grandson says they are too tight- but ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old Grandson says they are too tight- but work well at staying in place and covering his ears for short periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: B McCartney

customer_reviews.title: difficult for kid to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice product, but really awkward for a kid to open and adjust. These will be added to the spare hats/gloves/mittens basket.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ormond

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: warm but not heavy only fit behind the head they work good I am happy w them adj size too and you can stilll hear good w them on
customer_reviews.author: olds

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and soft, easy to adjust and comfortable for a very active person. It keeps the ears nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Shopper

customer_reviews.title: They fit my son perfectly. He's large for a ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit my son perfectly. He's large for a six year old, and honestly I was wondering if maybe I shouldn't order him an adult size. These are just the right size for him. They seem to be rugged enough to last him through the winter. If they don't survive, I'll let you all know!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: It fitted perfectly for my 5 yr old. And I think its going to fit him as he grows because of the way its made. Keeps his ears warm and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: shabs

customer_reviews.title: Ear Warmers
customer_reviews.text: My grandson wore these throughout the winter months. He does not like to wear hats or caps. I for see that he will continue to wear ear muffs in the years to come. Keep them stocked.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Marino

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good brand. These are the best ear warmers. I like that these are for kids. The fit is better for them.
customer_reviews.author: breesbazar

customer_reviews.title: wear all the time
customer_reviews.text: I wear this with my blue coat ,that I always wear to work.. I love it they fit me well
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warm and fit my daughter very well. Would also work ok for women with small heads.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my son perfectly. Not too tight not too loose. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 48 years old with a small head and these fit perfectly. Adult sizes are just too big. They are warm and light. I like how they fold and fit in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: good ones. keeps the ears warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 5 yr old and it a bit big in size for him. it expands which i like because he will be using it going forward but for this winter it doesn't stay in its place
customer_reviews.author: Alakh Garimella

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I have had a pair and my son wanted a pair. He loves them and I can't get him to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: DJDOM55

customer_reviews.title: And it's nice they can adjust to fit me also
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old son loves these! And it's nice they can adjust to fit me also :-)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Burkart

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: they seem to want to slip back off the head but warm if you can get them positioned right
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Good for youth or those with smaller heads
customer_reviews.text: Female with small head, short hair so fits well and securely, without sticking inches over my collar (even when completely collapsed), and just the color I was looking for. Men's 180s are way to big and uncomfortable Note these are worn from the back of neck/head and cover the ears, NOT from top of head.
customer_reviews.author: PickyShopper

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the adjustable strap on the back
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made..I don't like the adjustable strap on the back. I bought this for my son who is 10 and doesn't like to wear hats due to his hair do. The adjustable strap on the back twists and doesn't stay form fitting on the back of his head as seen on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: MEscobar
